content: now r5 single_crochet around 24 r6 6sc decrease x6 6sc 18 r7 3sc decrease x6 3sc 12 r8-9 single_crochet around 2 rounds 12 fo leave a tail for sewing stuff sitting body and head 7 instructions in bold are cottoncandy instructions not bolded are bubblegum r1 magic_ring 8sc 8 r2 increase x8 16 r3 single_crochet increase x8 24 r4 3sc increase x6 30 r5 4sc increase x6 36 r6 2sc trbo 12sc 11sc 10sc 36 r7 15sc 11sc 10sc 36 r8-9 15sc 12sc 9sc 2 rounds 36 r10 4sc decrease x2 4sc decrease 4sc decrease 3sc single_crochet decrease 4sc decrease 30 r11 14sc 9sc 7sc 30 instructions underlined use white r12 14sc 4sc single_crochet 4sc 7sc 30 r13 3sc decrease x3 2sc single_crochet decrease single_crochet 2sc decrease 3sc decrease 24 begin stuffing r14 12sc single_crochet 2sc single_crochet 2sc single_crochet 5sc 24 r15 12sc 2sc 3sc 2sc 5sc 24 cut off white r16 single_crochet decrease x4 single_crochet decrease x2 single_crochet decrease single_crochet decrease 16 we will be crocheting on the arms in the next round instructions underlined are when to crochet through the arm and body r17 4sc 4sc 5sc 3sc 16 r18 single_crochet 7sc 6sc 2sc 16 r19 increase x7 increase x8 increase 32 stuff the neck r20 2sc increase x4 2sc increase 2sc increase x5 2sc 42 r21 18sc 22sc 2sc 42 cut off the cottoncandy now r22-27 single_crochet around 6 rounds 42 r28 5sc decrease x6 36 r29 4sc decrease x6 30 r30 3sc decrease x6 24 begin stuffing the head r31 2sc decrease x6 18 r32 single_crochet decrease x6 12 r33 decrease x6 6 finish stuffing fo cut yarn leaving a few inches use a yarn needle to thread through the back loops of the remaining 6 stitches pull tight to close weave in the end 8 legs standing x2 the following instructions in bold are lilac instructions not bolded are bubblegum r1 magic_ring 6sc 6 tip- r2 increase x6 12 work in the back r3 single_crochet increase x6 18 loops of the r4 4sc 3scinc 2sc 3scinc 2sc 3scinc 7sc 24 3scinc for a cleaner look cut lilac off now r5 single_crochet around 24 r6 6sc decrease x6 6sc 18 r7 3sc decrease x6 3sc 12 r8-9 single_crochet around 2 rounds 12 fo the first leg mark the 10th stitch of the last round make a second leg crochet a extra 4sc after round 9 do not fo connecting legs/ standing body/ head 9 with your yarn still attached to your second leg take the first leg and place a single_crochet into that 10th stitch with the stitch marker in it this will count as the first single_crochet of r1 r1 single_crochet around 12 in the first leg and 12 in the second 24 r4 3sc increase x6 30 r5 4sc increase x6 36 instructions in bold are cottoncandy instructions not bolded are bubblegum r6 trbo 12sc 11sc 12sc 36 r7 13sc 11sc 12sc 36 r8-9 13sc 12sc 11sc 2 rounds 36 r10 4sc decrease x2
